title: 🌴 Come Tour our Renovated 2br at Solera Apartment Community 🌴
posting_body: ['To schedule a tour', 'We now book our tour appointments online!', 'Please call or text us at', 'show contact info', 'to self-schedule from your phone!', 'Book your appointment online today or anytime 24/7!', 'Property Description', 'Our large one and two bedroom floor plans include spacious fully-equipped kitchens with breakfast nooks, large closets with linen space, private patios and decks, and ceiling fans.', 'Select apartment homes come with a private backyard and upgraded interior finishes.', 'Residents at Solera can enjoy the convenience of the community swimming pool, laundry care center, and their own assigned parking spot.', 'Adding to all our great amenities is our location—just minutes from Santana Row, Valley Fair, and the greenest parks in the county.', 'Details', 'Availability date:', 'August 20, 2022', 'Pets:', 'Cats, Small Dogs (< 25lb), Large Dogs (> 25lb)', 'Pet notes:', 'Dogs and Cats Allowed: Residents are allowed a maximum of two pets per apartment.', 'A one-time security deposit and monthly rent fee of $75 for each dog and $50 for each cat.', 'The security deposit for the first pet is $500 per pet.', 'Please see a Leasing Associate for breed and weight restrictions.•$500 Deposit•$150', 'Monthly Pet Rent•$500 Fee•2 Pet Limit', 'Deposit:', '1x1 $500 2x1 $600 (approved credit)', 'Leasing options:', '12 months', 'Leasing notes:', 'Flexible Leasing Terms', 'Application fee:', '55.58', 'Amenities', 'Included in Utilities Cost:', 'Utilities Cost:', 'None', 'Laundry:', 'Shared', 'Parking type:', 'Garage, Covered', 'Parking notes:', '1 Free assigned parking -  rentable parking available', 'Appliances:', 'Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage disposal, Range/Oven', 'Exterior:', 'Private pool, Balcony/patio, Yard, Sprinkler system', 'Heating/cooling:', 'Heat: forced air, Ceiling fans', 'Wiring:', 'Cable-ready, High-speed internet', 'Facilities and Recreation:', 'Fitness center, Barbecue', 'Security and Access:', 'Controlled access, Gated entry', 'Views:', 'Additional features:', 'Non-Smoking Property', 'Offered by:', 'Solera', 'Equal Housing Opportunity']
